tabs.title: About
tabs.content: Broadino’s parent company in India is Broadline Innovations Private limited is an ISO 9001:2008-certified company with over three decades of extensive experience in Industry Automation, IIoT & Edge computing, Smart / Digital Factory, research in Industrial Automation, Software & Application Development, System Integration, and best practices in computing. Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Chennai, India, we offer a comprehensive range of consulting, technology, hardware, networking, and product engineering services. In a highly competitive and crowded marketplace, we have established a strong reputation and a key differentiator through our unique Business outcome-based model. With over thirty years of IT services expertise and a steadfast commitment to being accountable for our clients’ business success, our multi-location organization consistently delivers effective, tailored solutions to government agencies, public sector organizations, and corporate clients across world.

tabs.title: Belief in Action
tabs.content: Innovation, passion, and a commitment to excellence — these core principles form the foundation of our success. Over the years, we have consistently demonstrated our dedication to driving business growth and exceeding customer expectations. Our focus on delivering high-quality Industry 4.0 solutions has earned us a reputation as a dependable and capable partner in the industry. Known for our diligence and relentless pursuit of excellence, we prioritize customer satisfaction in everything we do. Since our founding in 1991, Broadline’s IT and Consulting Division has continuously evolved, establishing itself as a trusted partner for growth across numerous institutions, government agencies, and private enterprises.
